title: Thriving in the Midst of Financial Ruin, Part 1
itunes:author: John Fuller & Greg Smalley
itunes:summary:
Financial problems don't have to end your marriage. With focused effort, you and your spouse can thrive financially. John, Greg and Erin offer hope to couples with financial problems.

Receive Erin Odom's book More Than Just Making It with your gift of any amount!
